code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import blogReducer from"../features/post/blogSlice";import userReducer from"../features/user/userSlice";import accountReducer from"../features/account/accountSlice";import topicReducer from"../features/topic/topicSlice";import bloggerReducer from"../features/user/bloggerSlice";export default configureStore({reducer:{blog:blogReducer,user:userReducer,account:accountReducer,topic:topicReducer,blogger:bloggerReducer}});
